Client Job Description Below:-
SR Business Analyst, with broker dealer / advisor retail experience would be great. This person is a pure BA, no SPS experience is needed. Strong soft skills, requirements elicitation and collaboration w/ business on new products for the Empower Retail group.

Business Analyst, as part of the transformation team, is the liaison between IT and business, works directly with end-user groups and management to elicit user requirements and develop functional specifications for digital solutions. This position will collaborate closely with other analysts, developers and designers to ensure system functionality aligns with business requirements and compliance standards.

The Senior Digital Business Analyst performs complex tasks with some oversight such as developing business cases, experience storyboards, personas, digital requirements management and contributing to the system deliverables and user documentation.

What you will do
Lead and facilitate cross departmental teams to transform business requirements into user and functional requirements
Work with UI/UX designers and other technology teams to document business needs for digital project deliverables
Write and maintain software requirements specifications that are clear, complete and executable
Verify technical design specifications meet user requirements
Develop a variety of models and diagrams including system context models, data flow diagrams and use case diagrams
Create user scenarios for user acceptance testing
Develop deep domain knowledge on key applications
Partner with the project manager to determine project task estimates, deadlines and deliverables, simultaneously working on multiple projects
Perform gap analysis and define gap closure strategies
Gain consensus and approval on final requirements

What you will bring
8+ years' related experience
Experience managing requirements with use cases experience creating software requirements specifications
Strong experience creating user stories defining business needs for digital solutions
Highly analytical and detail oriented
Superior written, listening and verbal communication skills
Able to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical project team members
Extensive experience creating business documents using Microsoft Word, Excel and Visio

What will set you apart
Working knowledge of software development methodologies particularly in the digital space
Ability to effectively present information and respond to questions from management and end users
Ability to define problems, assemble and analyze data, establish facts, draw valid conclusions and make recommendations
Working knowledge of Web Technologies
Proficiency in SQL
